thread.title: Veeva to Release Fiscal 2019 First Quarter Results on May 24, 2018

author: cnbc.com
title: Veeva to Release Fiscal 2019 First Quarter Results on May 24, 2018
text:
PLEASANTON, Calif.--(BUSINESS WIRE)-- Veeva Systems Inc. (NYSE: VEEV), a leading industry cloud provider for life sciences, will announce its fiscal first quarter which ended April 30, 2018 after market close on May 24, 2018. Veeva will host a conference call and webcast that day at 1:30 p.m. PT (4:30 p.m. ET) to discuss its financial results.
Event: Veeva’s Fiscal 2019 First Quarter Results Conference Call Date: Thursday, May 24, 2018 Time: 1:30 p.m. PT (4:30 p.m. ET) Live Dial-In: 1-833-235-5654, Domestic 1-647-689-4160, International Conference ID 655 5019 Webcast: ir.veeva.com
A webcast replay will be available on Veeva’s investor relations website following the call.
About Veeva Systems
Veeva Systems Inc. is a leader in cloud-based software for the global life sciences industry. Committed to innovation, product excellence, and customer success, Veeva has more than 600 customers, ranging from the world's largest pharmaceutical companies to emerging biotechs. Veeva is headquartered in the San Francisco Bay Area, with offices in Europe, Asia, and Latin America. For more information, visit veeva.com .
